docs.title: How to 🔐 Sign In to schulthess?
docs.text:
You can Sign In to the Schulthess web application by using:

  • Manual Sign In by using your active Email and password.
  • Schulthess Employee to access your account by Schulthess Employee portal.
  • Microsoft by using your Microsoft account.

docs.title: 1️⃣ How to Sign In by Email & Password?
docs.text:
You can Sign In by following these simple steps.

  1. Enter your registered Email.
  2. Type your Password related to your account.
  3. Click on the "Sign In" button to sign in to your account.

Forgot Password

You can reset your password if you forgot it.

Remember Me

You can save your login details for the future login.

docs.title: 2️⃣ How to Sign In by Schulthess Employee?
docs.text:
You can Sing In by using the Schulthess Employee active directory by following these simple steps.

  1. Click on the "Schulthess Employee" option from the Sign In page.

  2. You will navigate to the schulthess employee portal.

  3. Enter your Email for your account.
  4. Click on the "Next" button to add your password.
  5. Type your Password related to your account.
  6. Click on the "Sign In" button to sign in to your account.

Forgot Password

You can reset your password if you forgot it.

Sign In Options

You can Sign In with Security Key or GitHub account

docs.title: 3️⃣ How to Sign In by Microsoft?
docs.text:
You can Sign In by using the Microsoft account by following these simple steps.

  1. Click on the "Microsoft" option from the Sign In page.

  2. You will navigate to the microsoft sign in portal.

  3. Enter your Email for your account.
  4. Click on the "Next" button to add your password.
  5. Type your Password related to your account.
  6. Click on the "Sign In" button to sign in to your account. !!! note "Forgot Password" You can reset your password if you forgot it.

Sign In Options

You can Sign In with Security Key, GitHub, or Organization account

docs.title: 🔍 Navigation Bar
docs.text: 🧭 Navigation ℹ️ Description The default home page which contains stats and charts about Usage by machine type, Total amount, Amount by laundry, and Laundry Group Performance. Under Service Partner, you can find the information to which service partner your organization belongs to. This is the service partner which manages any questions or concerns you might have. Visualises your organization, the top entity of your washMaster account. This is usually your customer account with the address of the head office. Example: Housing Corporation GmbH Visualises the Laundry Groups to which you have access. More than one Laundry Group can belong to the same organization. Options, price lists and Laundry User access are regulated at Laundry Group level, as is payment. Example: Genossenschaft am Fluss Visualises the Laundries to which you have access. More than one Laundry can belong to the same Laundry Group. A Laundry is usually a room with a few machines that are identifiable to your Laundry Users. Example: Room A Visualises the connected machines. Example: Washer A Visualises the Laundry Users, the users of the mobile app, assigned to your Laundry Groups. Here you can also create accounts for non-digital users and assign RFID cards. View the membership and access of your colleagues. This regulates access to https://smart.schulthess.ch. Here you can revoke membership or invite new colleagues. Depending on the contract with Schulthess Maschinen AG, you have access to comprehensive usage and payment reports.

docs.title: 🗺️ Navigation
docs.text:
Navigation works as follows:

Menu >> List overview >> Details page

docs.title: 🏢 Organizations
docs.text:
At organization level, you can view the organizations to which you have access.

Click on an entry in the list to see the details. Details are read-only and are taken from your customer data during the sale. You can only update the Service Partner.

Note

To request changes, please get in touch with your Schulthess contact person.

docs.title: 📍 Laundry Groups
docs.text: The Laundry Group level is the main level where you can edit all relevant settings for your users for washing and drying.

docs.title: ➕ Create Laundry Groups
docs.text:
The most important first step at Smart Schulthess is creating the Laundry Group. Click on “CREATE NEW - "

  • Choose a name, e.g. the name of your Laundry or your property.
  • Enter the external payout reference, email address, IBAN number and billing address for the monthly credit.

Note

You can leave the coordinates blank – these are especially important for public laundries.

  • Select your currency and payment method.The default is prepaid. This enables your users to pay via a prepaid credit. Direct Pay is also possible, but this is associated with higher fees. You can then activate the desired functions.

Note

Note that these incur higher licence fees. Please contact your Schulthess advisor for the current licence prices.

  • Finally, you need to select service package plan.

docs.title: 🔍 Headings
docs.text: Header Item Description Here you can edit the details of your Laundry Group (See here). Here you can send messages to your Laundry Users (See here). Here you can set the prices for the washing and drying cycles (See here). Here you can manage your subscription plan (See here). Here you can set the washing and drying times (See here). Here you can check monthly credit payouts (See here). Here you can block additional public or private holidays. You can also change the advanced reservation settings for your users (See here).

docs.title: 📅 Set Calendar Opening Hours
docs.text:
The Laundry Group calendar sets the daily opening hours, happy hour and ad hoc washing times.

📅 Reservability ℹ️ Explanation 🆓 Free (reservable) Reservable via the calendar. The Laundry User can book an appointment up to one year in advance. 🔄 Ad hoc Free, but cannot be reserved in the calendar, i.e. the Laundry User can then wash spontaneously when the machine is free. 🚫 Blocked The Laundry is closed at this time. 💲 Price ℹ️ Explanation 👌 Normal Normal prices apply. 🍹 Happy hour Reduced prices apply to this time slot.

To edit the calendar, click on any field:

Now set your opening hours. For example, if you want the Laundry to be open between 08:00 and 20:00, this would be the correct setting:

After configuration, your typical washing group calendar could look like this:

  • Open from 08:00 to 20:00, closed on Sundays.
  • Happy hour washing from 08:00 to 10:00, Monday to Friday
  • Ad hoc washing on Saturday, i.e. you cannot book the popular day of Saturday in advance.

This is the weekly calendar, which is always valid. If you want to block other holidays, read the “Settings” section here.

docs.title: 📢 Notify Laundry Users with Messages
docs.text:
Here you can send a message to all Laundry Users assigned to your Laundry Groups. You can write a title and message. Use “Send message”.

The message is displayed in the app:

Note

The message is not automatically cleared. If you want the message to disappear, please press “Clear message”.

docs.title: 🔭 Overview (Edit credit recipient)
docs.text:
You can view or update the Site & Billing address and location.

Note

If you have Laundries at more than one location, you can enter your location address or your billing address here.

docs.title: 🌍 General
docs.text:
Here you can edit the prices for each machine type.

🌀 Machine Type 📄 Description Schulthess Homecare washing machine Schulthess models from 2016 with integrated washMaster function, with program prices. Schulthess dryer Schulthess models from 2016 with integrated washMaster function, with program prices. Schulthess Professional washing machine Schulthess models of the Professional line, with integrated washMaster function, with program prices including special programs. Washing machine Old Schulthess washing machine or non-Schulthess washing machine without access to program information, with time-dependent prices. Dryer Old Schulthess dryer or non-Schulthess dryer, without access to program information, with time-dependent prices. Room air laundry dryer Air dryer with time-dependent prices.

Note

When creating a Laundry Group, the default prices are automatically imported. You can change these at any time.

docs.title: 🌀 Adjust Program Prices
docs.text:
This section shows a price change with a Schulthess Homecare washing machine. The process is exactly the same for other models or dryers. You can edit the values of the individual programs.

Note

The price for the happy hour program can be set in the left column. You can set happy hour slots in the calendar (see here).

You can edit all the values at once by changing the values of the default price or the happy hour price change with “Adjust Values”.

❗️ Don’t forget to save!

Note

The price change must first synchronise with the machines and is active at the earliest in the next full hour.

docs.title: ⏰ Adjust Time-based Prices
docs.text:
To adjust the time-based prices, open the price list and press “Edit”.

🔵 Item 📄 Description 💲 Default price If normal opening hours have been set in the Laundry Group calendar, this price is used for billing. 🍹 Happy hour price If happy hour is set in the calendar, the happy hour price is used for billing. ⏱️ Max. program time (minutes) The maximum program time must correspond to the longest program duration of the connected machine. It is advisable to add a extra minutes as buffer time. 🕒 Billing increment The program price is calculated at the end of the program depending on the running time of the machine. The actual program price is calculated on the basis of the maximum price, the running time and the billing increment.

For tenant-friendly billing of the actual program price, it is advisable to set the billing increment at CHF 0.10.

This example illustrates the billing:

  • Price: CHF 2.40 Max. program duration: 180 minutes Billing increment: CHF 0.10
  • Number of billing increments: Price / Max. program duration = › 2.4 / 0.1 = 24
  • Time per billing increment: Max. program duration / Number of billing increments = › 180 / 24 = 7.5 CHF 0.10 is billed per 7.5 minutes.

Assumption

Washing cycle lasts 120 minutes: Actual time / time per billing increment › 120 / 7.5 = 16 Price calculation: Units * billing increment = › 16 * 0.1 = CHF 1.60

docs.title: 🔄 Adjust Subscriptions
docs.text:
You have the flexibility to customize your subscription by choosing the plan that suits your preferences.

🛠️ Feature 💰 Payment 🌟 Experience 📊 Optimization Management 💡 Smart Asset Management ✅ ✅ ✅ 👁️ Smart Monitoring ✅ ✅ ✅ 💰 washMaster Payment ✅ ✅ ✅ 📱 Mobile App & 💳 Prepaid Cards ✅ ✅ ✅ 🌐 Remote Pricelist Management ✅ ✅ ✅ 🔔 Push Notifications ❌ ✅ ✅ 📡 Info Channel ❌ ✅ ✅ 📊 Usage & Turnover Reports ❌ ❌ ✅ 📈 Program & Consumption Report ❌ ❌ ✅ 🎮 Easy Live Control / Utilization ❌ ❌ ✅

You can activate the additional options like Direct Care, Calendar, and Direct Pay.

🔵 Item 📄 Description 🛠️ Direct Care Automatic Service Request & Remote Updates. 📆 Calendar Opening Hours, Reservation functionality & Happy Hour. 💵 Direct Pay Pay directly without downloading app and without registering. Ideal for walk-in customers.
